name: Saurianborn Republic
lore:
Long ago, in a distant corner of the galaxy, a remarkable planet named Draconos Prime emerged into existence. The planet was unlike any other, boasting a unique blend of lush jungles, ancient ruins, and towering mountain ranges. Yet, what made Draconos Prime truly exceptional were its sentient inhabitants, a highly advanced species known as the Saurianborn.

The Saurianborn were a race of reptilian beings with distinct features reminiscent of both dinosaurs and lizards. They evolved over millennia, harnessing the planet's natural resources and developing impressive technologies. As their knowledge and understanding grew, they united under the banner of the Saurianborn Republicâ€”a democratic government dedicated to preserving their traditions and values.

In the early days of the Saurianborn Republic, a period of great enlightenment swept across Draconos Prime. The Saurianborn delved into the mysteries of the cosmos, embracing science, arts, and philosophy. Their advanced knowledge and technological prowess allowed them to create remarkable structures and inventions, making them a force to be reckoned with in the galaxy.

As the Saurianborn explored the vast expanse of space, they encountered various other civilizations and species. Some were peaceful, while others were more aggressive. These encounters led the Saurianborn to believe that they were destined to be the true rulers of the galaxy. They saw themselves as a superior race, not out of arrogance, but from their strong belief in the merit of their democratic republic and the unity of their people.

Over time, the Saurianborn Republic expanded its reach and influence throughout neighboring star systems. They established colonies, forged alliances, and maintained a powerful fleet, all in the pursuit of spreading their ideals and protecting their way of life. The Saurianborn promoted cooperation and peaceful coexistence but were always ready to defend their interests when necessary.

Despite their advancements and accomplishments, not all species across the galaxy agreed with the Saurianborn's claim of being the true rulers. Some viewed their confidence as arrogance, sparking tensions and occasional conflicts. This division led to a schism, creating a great rift among various civilizations, with some siding with the Saurianborn and others opposing their dominion.

As the Saurianborn continued to explore and interact with diverse cultures, some of their own people began to question their beliefs. Not everyone within the Republic agreed with the idea of galactic dominance. These dissenters believed in finding a more balanced approach to coexistence, recognizing that each civilization had its unique contributions to offer.

Today, the Saurianborn Republic stands strong on Draconos Prime, still fervently believing in their right to rule the galaxy. However, they face challenges from both external and internal sources. The tension between those who seek to maintain their supremacy and those striving for greater harmony continues to shape the future of Draconos Prime and its place in the vast galactic tapestry.

As the Saurianborn explore the cosmos and interact with new civilizations, their convictions may be tested, and the destiny of Draconos Prime may yet unfold in unexpected ways, forever altering the course of the Saurianborn Republic's reign.
author: guitarninja

gecko_oracle.name: Gecko Oracle
gecko_oracle.description: Oracles can divine the outcome of a battle through magical rituals. They also function as the spiritiual overseers of the Lizardfolk Empire.

gecko_oracle_raptor.name: Gecko Oracle on Raptor
gecko_oracle_raptor.description: Oracles can divine the outcome of a battle through magical rituals. They also function as the spiritiual overseers of the Lizardfolk Empire.

gecko_oracle_pterodactyl.name: Gecko Oracle on Pterodactyl
gecko_oracle_pterodactyl.description: Oracles can divine the outcome of a battle through magical rituals. They also function as the spiritiual overseers of the Lizardfolk Empire.

gecko_oracle_dreadscale.name: Gecko Oracle on Dreadscale
gecko_oracle_dreadscale.description: Oracles can divine the outcome of a battle through magical rituals. They also function as the spiritiual overseers of the Lizardfolk Empire.

gecko_chieftain.name: Gecko Chieftain
gecko_chieftain.description: A great hero of the gecko tribes, leading his kin into battle alongside the other lizardfolk tribes.

gecko_chieftain_raptor.name: Gecko Chieftain on Raptor
gecko_chieftain_raptor.description: A great hero of the gecko tribes on a swift raptor, leading his kin into battle alongside the other lizardfolk tribes.

gecko_chieftain_pterodactyl.name: Gecko Chieftain on Pterodactyl
gecko_chieftain_pterodactyl.description: A great hero of the gecko tribes riding an airborne hunter, leading his kin into battle alongside the other lizardfolk tribes.

gecko_chief_dreadscale.name: Gecko Chieftain on Dreadscale
gecko_chief_dreadscale.description: A great herald of the Lizardfolk Empire riding a terrifying dinosaur, slaughtering their foes with great zeal.

saurian_warlord.name: Saurian Warlord
saurian_warlord.description: A great herald of the Lizardfolk Empire, slaughtering their foes with great zeal.

saurian_warlord_terrorfang.name: Saurian Warlord on Terrorfang
saurian_warlord_terrorfang.description: A great herald of the Lizardfolk Empire riding a deadly dinosaur, slaughtering their foes with great zeal.

saurian_warlord_dreadscale.name: Saurian Warlord on Dreadscale
saurian_warlord_dreadscale.description: A great herald of the Lizardfolk Empire riding a terrifying dinosaur, slaughtering their foes with great zeal.

greatlizard_mage.name: Great-Lizard Mage
greatlizard_mage.description: The oldest and wisest of the Lizardfolk, the Great-Lizards command reality to change around them.

saurian_warriors.name: Saurian Warriors
saurian_warriors.description: The main-line warriors of the Lizardfolk Empire, combining great combat strategies with primal savagery.

gecko_warriors.name: Gecko Warriors
gecko_warriors.description: The main-line warriors of the Lizardfolk Empire, small in stature but very dangerous in numbers.

gecko_riders.name: Gecko Raptor-Riders
gecko_riders.description: Elite geckos riding swift dinosaurs, using their speed to outmatch their foes.

saurian_riders.name: Saurian Terrorfang-Riders
saurian_riders.description: Elite saurians riding deadly dinosaurs, crushing their foes under an avalance of claws and teeth.

chameleon_scouts.name: Chameleon Scouts
chameleon_scouts.description: Experts of camouflage and deception, these swift warriors strike from the shadows.

pterodactyl_riders.name: Pterodactyl Riders
pterodactyl_riders.description: Airborne predators, carrying gecko warriors on their back.

crocodile_warriors.name: Crocodile Warriors
crocodile_warriors.description: Hulking warriors of the lizardfolk empire, using their bulk and greater strength to crush their foes under their feet.

giant_dreadscale.name: Giant Dreadscale
giant_dreadscale.description: A hulking monstrosity from the depths of the jungle, this terrifying predator is a weapon of mass destruction.

hunting_pack.name: Hunting Beasts
hunting_pack.description: A pack of deadly beasts using natural weapons to hunt their prey.

direhorn.name: Direhorn
direhorn.description: A massive dinosaur which is used for various purposes on the battlefield.

relics.name: Feathered Crown
relics.flavor: A magical headdress which blesses its wearer with the swiftness of the wind.

relics.name: Starborn
relics.flavor: Those blessed by the gods of the heavens themselves shine brightly with astral light.

relics.name: Obsidian Blades
relics.description: Replace one _Saurus_ _Leader_ model Great Weapon with the Obsidian Blades.
relics.flavor: Mystical weapons of unknown origin, they grant their wielder the might of the earth.

ancestral_paths.name: Ancestral Paths
ancestral_paths.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may move up to 12" ignoring all models and terrain. This must end outside of 12" of any enemy units.

starburst.name: Starburst
starburst.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 5 automatic hits with AP(2).

primal_fury.name: Primal Fury
primal_fury.description: Target friendly unit within 12" makes one additional attack with any Melee weapon until the end of the turn.

natural_camo.name: Natural Camoflage
natural_camo.description: Use when an enemy targets a _Gecko_ unit with a shooting attack while that unit has the benefit of cover.  The enemy suffers -1 Accuracy for that attack.
natural_camo.flavor: Geckos are skilled at blending in with their environments.

fearless.name: Fearless
fearless.description: Use before activating a unit. That unit may immediately remove up to 2 Shock.
fearless.flavor: The proud lizardfolk survive in a dangerous world by sheer willpower alone.

cold_blooded.name: Cold-blooded
cold_blooded.description: Use when an _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ unit fights. Hits rolls of 1 or 2 gain +2 AP.
cold_blooded.flavor: While they wield weapons and armor made of gold, the lizardfolk are ferocious predators at heart.
